{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Orange Pi R1 Plus LTS.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Open-source Single-board Computer/Soft Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.orangepi.org/Orange%20Pi%20R1%20Plus%20LTS/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Orange Pi |model = OPI |submodelappend = yes |submodel = R1 Plus LTS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/25/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Orange_Pi_R1_Plus_LTS |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3328; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Zbit Semi;ZB25VQ128ASIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Allwinner;ATL3A0832-S12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8153B; |eth3chip = Motorcomm;YT8531C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C0:74:2B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09;; |stockos = Linux;5.10.75;Ubuntu;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC, Micro SD Card slot |addchip = Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM<!-- w/ EUI-48 Node Identity-->;Microchip;NC-24AA025E48T-I/OT;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1;,,, 400mA 1.25V Adjustable LDO Voltage Regulator;MicrOne;ME6221;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = orangepi |manuf = Shenzhen Xunlong |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Debian, Armbian, Android 9
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2021 |estprice = 28 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09M413HR5 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|Orange Pi models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz :64-bit ARMv8 CPU with NEON and Crypto Extensions *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) LPDDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot / :16MB SPI NOR Flash *1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/17/orange-pi-r1-plus-lts-cheaper-dual-gbe-sbc-yt8531c-ethernet-phy/ ''Orange Pi R1 Plus LTS is a cheaper dual GbE SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/12/orange-pi-r1-plus-lts-metal-enclosure/ ''Orange Pi R1 Plus LTS sells with metal enclosure'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/xunlong/orange_pi_r1_plus ''Xunlong Orange Pi R1 Plus / R1 Plus LTS'' on '''OpenWrt ''' ]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/xunlong/xunlong_orange_pi_r1_plus_lts |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/xunlong/orange_pi_r1_plus |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = auto |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
